com.palomamobile.android.sdk.auth

Interface IAuthManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IServiceManager<IAuthService>

    public interface IAuthManager
extends IServiceManager<IAuthService>
    This interface is normally NOT of interest to Application developers unless you are intending to extend or modify the SDK functionality.
    Implementing classes provide access to Client and User access tokens that are required when accessing authenticated Paloma Services over network.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IAuthManager.TokenRetrievalMode
      Specifies the token retrieval options.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String AUTH_REQUIREMENT_HEADER_NAME 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearCachedTokens()
      Removes both Client and User access token from cache so that the next call to getUserAccessToken(TokenRetrievalMode, String) or getClientAccessToken(TokenRetrievalMode, String) with a IAuthManager.TokenRetrievalMode.CACHE_ONLY parameter will return null
      com.palomamobile.android.sdk.auth.AccessToken getClientAccessToken(IAuthManager.TokenRetrievalMode mode, String requestId)
      Retrieve the access token for the client application.
      com.palomamobile.android.sdk.auth.AccessToken getUserAccessToken(IAuthManager.TokenRetrievalMode mode, String requestId)
      Retrieve the access token for the application user.
      com.palomamobile.android.sdk.auth.AccessToken refreshUserAccessToken(String refreshToken, String requestId)
      Retrieve a fresh access token for the application user using the provided refresh token.
      void setUserCredentialsProvider(IUserCredentialsProvider credentialsProvider)
      Registers an implementation of the IUserCredentialsProvider interface.

    • Field Detail

      • AUTH_REQUIREMENT_HEADER_NAME

        static final String AUTH_REQUIREMENT_HEADER_NAME
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • clearCachedTokens

        void clearCachedTokens()
        Removes both Client and User access token from cache so that the next call to getUserAccessToken(TokenRetrievalMode, String) or getClientAccessToken(TokenRetrievalMode, String) with a IAuthManager.TokenRetrievalMode.CACHE_ONLY parameter will return null

      • getClientAccessToken

        com.palomamobile.android.sdk.auth.AccessToken getClientAccessToken(IAuthManager.TokenRetrievalMode mode,
                                                                 String requestId)
        Retrieve the access token for the client application. The method may return null if the Access Token cannot be retrieved using the IAuthManager.TokenRetrievalMode specified.
        Parameters:
        mode - of retrieval
        Returns:
        client application access token

      • getUserAccessToken

        com.palomamobile.android.sdk.auth.AccessToken getUserAccessToken(IAuthManager.TokenRetrievalMode mode,
                                                               String requestId)
        Retrieve the access token for the application user. The method may return null if the Access Token cannot be retrieved using the IAuthManager.TokenRetrievalMode specified.
        Parameters:
        mode - of retrieval
        requestId - of the request that triggered this method call
        Returns:
        user access token
        Throws:
        CredentialsProviderMissingException - if calling this method results in an attempt to retrieve the user token from the network before setUserCredentialsProvider(IUserCredentialsProvider) has been called, this is because we must be able to Auth the user with the provided credentials before we can get the token back

      • refreshUserAccessToken

        com.palomamobile.android.sdk.auth.AccessToken refreshUserAccessToken(String refreshToken,
                                                                   String requestId)
        Retrieve a fresh access token for the application user using the provided refresh token.
        Parameters:
        refreshToken - user refresh token returned with the previous user token
        requestId - of the request that triggered this method call
        Returns:
        fresh user access token

      • setUserCredentialsProvider

        void setUserCredentialsProvider(IUserCredentialsProvider credentialsProvider)
        Registers an implementation of the IUserCredentialsProvider interface. This method must be called must be registered prior to attempting to getUserAccessToken(TokenRetrievalMode, String) over network, since retrieving a user token requires a valid set of user credentials.
        Parameters:
        credentialsProvider -
